check.title: Learn more about WONDER DAO* in advance!

about.title: Introduction DAO
about.desc: WONDER DAO is a DAO authorized to operate WEMIX3.0 mainnet nodes, and takes responsibility as a Node Council Partner contributing to the stable operation and innovation of WEMIX3.0.
about.subdesc1:
Recruitment is scheduled to begin
 in <0>{{period}}</0>
about.subdesc2:
Until the end of recruitment
<0>{{period}}</0> left.
about.subdesc4: You can participate in WONDER DAO anytime!
about.subdesc5: If you want to participate in WONDER DAO after the recruitment ends, you can participate by purchasing Wonder (DAO Token) on WEMIX.Fi.
about.subdescBtn: Go to Buy Wonder on WEMIX.Fi
about.caption: This is before recruitment begins.

before.desc: Join us now. The higher the participation rate, the more Wonders you can earn.

after.desc:
참여 수량 : <0>{{amount}}</0> WEMIX
현재 참여 비중 : <1>{{percent}}</1> %
after.tooltip: You can increase the proportion of participation through additional participation!

tooltip.1: It will take about 2 hours to calculate Wonder's distribution. Once the calculation is complete, you can earn Wonders at Station.
tooltip.2: We're sorry. The DAO formation was canceled because the minimum recruitment target amount was not met. Please proceed with the refund of the participation amount!

reward.title: WONDER DAO TOKEN FLOW
reward.desc: (temp) WONDER DAO pursues the vision of a continuously growing community through tokenomics.

1.name:
Participate in
WONDER DAO NCP
& Acquire PMR

caution.0: If the participating WEMIX quantity is greater than the WEMIX quantity corresponding to the distributed Wonder quantity, the difference will be refunded.
caution.1: Additional participation and cancellation of participation are only possible during the recruitment period.

members.title:
Participate in WONDER DAO 
and become a part of the 40 WONDERS.
members.desc:
Becoming a member of WONDER DAO means becoming a partner to the global leaders 
in the various areas and industries that consist the 40 WONDERS.

coreValue.title2:
A Community Pioneering the Evolution 
of the Blockchain Ecosystem
coreValue.subdesc1-1:
Manage DAOs with a 
transparent On-chain governance program!
coreValue.subdesc1-2:
DAO is operated with transparent rules:
activities like discussions on various topics, voting using Governance Tokens, moving funds that are recorded on the blockchain, etc.
coreValue.subdesc2-1:
Create results like never before 
 with collaboration that goes beyond time!
coreValue.subdesc2-2: Engage with people with various interests beyond space and time.
coreValue.subdesc3-1: Grow together with DAOs you create!
coreValue.subdesc3-2: The performance of DAOs is transparently managed to achieve the growth of DAOs and create a virtuous cycle through reinvestment.

neith.title: What is the Neith Protocol?
neith.desc: The seven elements of the Neith Protocol allow community members to work together in various ways, unlimited. Join us to bring innovation and creative ideas to life.
neith.btn1: Read more about the Neith Protocol

0.title: Station
0.desc: Members are recruited, and DAO Tokens get  distributed to achieve the collective goal of a DAO.

1.title: Trust
1.desc: DAO's name and authority are delegated to become the subject of the contract Off-chain with the execution and management of the business.

2.title: Treasury
2.desc: This is the community vault where DAO funds are collected and stored.

3.title: Obelisk
3.desc: NILERS can receive Governance Tokens by staking DAO Tokens to participate in Governance.

4.title: Incinerator
4.desc: The value of DAO Token increases by burning a part of DAO Tokens.

5.title: Governance
5.desc: By using Governance Tokens, agendas can be created to operate DAO while making decisions through voting.

6.title: Creator
6.desc: Creator provides IP and core business for the growth of DAO. For NFT business, NILERS can receive the Creator share of profits.

type.title1: What is your area of interest?
type.desc2: Explore various types of DAOs with unique values!

join.title: I want to create a DAO!
join.desc: Request to create a DAO of your own.

DaoRequestModal.title: Request to Create
DaoRequestModal.desc: Enter the details of the DAO you want to create.

daoCategory.label: DAO Type
daoCategory.placeholder: Select the type of DAO you are looking for.

introduction.label: Detailed Requests (Optional)
introduction.placeholder: If you have detailed requests about the DAO you want to see created, please write them in here. (This part is mandatory if you have selected Misc. for the type of DAO.)

email.label: Email
email.placeholder: Please type your email address here.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.wonderTitle:
The 6 protocols 
play a pivotal role in WONDER DAO operations and development.
protocol.arteumTitle:
The 7 protocols 
play a pivotal role in ARTEUM DAO operations and development.
protocol.deltaTitle:
The 6 protocols 
and the Delta protocol play a pivotal role in DELTA DAO operations and development.
protocol.oracleTitle:
The 6 protocols 
play a pivotal role in ORACLE DAO operations and development.

wonder.title: Transparent and Democratic Decision-making
wonder.desc: Make various proposals related to WONDER DAO operations, and participate in the decision-making process through discussions and votes.
tag: Set amount of DAO Tokens to burn
wonder.stepDesc:
Proposals are voted on with g.WONDER, the Governance Token, as voting rights 
and DAO Governance has 3 steps.

arteum.title: Transparent and Democratic Decision-making
arteum.desc: Make various proposals related to ARTEUM DAO operations, and participate in the decision-making process through discussions and votes.
tag: Decide on the sale of art pieces
Set amount of DAO Tokens to burn
arteum.stepDesc:
Proposals are voted on with g.ARTEUM, the Governance Token, as voting rights 
and DAO Governance has 3 steps.

delta.title: Transparent and Democratic Decision-making
delta.desc: Make various proposals related to DELTA DAO operations, and participate in the decision-making process through discussions and votes.
delta.stepDesc:
Agendas are voted on with Governance Tokens as voting rights, 
and DAO Governance has 3 steps.

oracle.title: Transparent and Democratic Decision-making
oracle.desc: The DAO contributes to the growth of the protocol ecosystem through the various activities connecting the Off-chain world to the On-chain world.
oracle.stepDesc:
Proposals are voted on with PARTICLE, the Governance Token, as voting rights 
and DAO Governance has 3 steps.

wonder.text:
Supporting the stable operations 
and transparent communications of the WONDER DAO
wonder.descript: The WONDER DAO's Trust is delegated the NCP node operations of the WONDER DAO. It exercises its voting rights under the WONDER DAO name on WEMIX3.0 Governance Proposals. It also communicates and provides information related to the activities mentioned above to the WONDER DAO in transparent notices.

arteum.text: Support from expert counsel such as Yeolmaecompany And transparent communications
arteum.descript: The Trust makes valuable data public and supports the activities of the DAO members with advice from expert counsel in the art world such as Yeolmaecompany, who successfully launched the first domestic group art purchase platform. Matters related to the Trust, such as its duties and possible replacements are also decided by the DAO.

delta.text: Trust built through constant communication and advanced technologies
delta.descript: The team that built the DELTA protocol and designed the initial strategies is responsible for the Trust. The Trust's role is to develop and deploy decisions made by the DAO into Smart Contracts. Furthermore, it also provides information on and communicates about newly deployed strategies and new products to the community in a transparent way.

oracle.text: A Way of Management Created Together and More Trustworthy
oracle.descript: Participate as a new Feeder or Aggregator following the DAO's decisions, or delegate your voting rights to an existing participant in the ecosystem as selected by the DAO and get the resulting performance distributed to you.

wonder.text: Get DAO Tokens and Governance Tokens to become a member of WONDER DAO and participate in the decision-making process.

token1.name: WONDER
token1.descript: WONDER Token is a utility token that can be used to issue Governance Tokens. You can Stake WONDER to obtain g.WONDER Tokens.

feature.p2: To get this token: Participate in Station or Use the Swap service in WEMIX.Fi

token2.name: g.WONDER
token2.descript: g.WONDER gives you the right to participate in On-chain Governance, which decides on all matters of WONDER DAO operations.

feature.p1: A Governance Token that is issued or burned in the DAO Obelisk
feature.p2: To get this token: Use the Obelisk in WONDER DAO

arteum.text: Get DAO Tokens and Governance Tokens to become a member of ARTEUM DAO and participate in the decision-making process.

token1.name: ARTEUM
token1.descript: The ARTEUM Token is a Utility Token that can be used to issue Governance Tokens. Stake ARTEUM to issue g.ARTEUM Tokens.

feature.p1: Issued amount: To be decided (Please refer to future notices)
feature.p2: To get this token: Participate in Station or Use the Swap service in WEMIX.Fi

token2.name: g.ARTEUM
token2.descript: g.ARTEUM is an On-chain Token that gives you the right to participate in On-chain Governance, which decides on all matters of ARTEUM DAO operations.

feature.p1: A Governance Token that is issued or burned in the DAO Obelisk
feature.p2: To get this token: Use the Obelisk in ARTEUM DAO

delta.text: Get DAO Tokens and Governance Tokens to become a member of DELTA DAO and participate in the decision-making process.

token1.name: DELTA
token1.descript: DELTA is the DAO Token for the DELTA protocol, and the first sale of this Token is made to the DELTA DAO, putting it into circulation. DELTA is allocated as rewards for depositing base assets to products connected to DELTA. DELTA is a Token utilized for Governance necessary to manage the DELTA protocol, and the DAO decides on the main variables of the protocol, as well as the addition of more strategies, and directions for future development.

token2.name: g.DELTA
token2.descript: g.DELTA is used for the DAO to decide on all matters related to DAO operations, like profits from operations and the improvement of DELTA protocol strategies, reward allocation, and more. There are no plans for the initial Governance Token to be issued, and more information on the issuance date of Governance Tokens and detailed uses will be provided following discussions between the DAO and the Trust.

oracle.text: Get PARTICLE Token to prove your membership in the ORACLE DAO.

token1.name: PARTICLE
token1.descript: The PARTICLE Token is a Governance Token with which you can prove your membership in the ORACLE DAO, as well as a necessary Utility Token utilized within the ORACLE ecosystem.

wonder.title: WONDER DAO
wonder.subTitle: The First, The Wonder of WONDERS

cont.title:
This Community is the first node of the 40 nodes
that have come together to participate in the Governance of the WEMIX3.0 mainnet.
cont.desc: By contributing to the development and growth of the WEMIX ecosystem, the DAO received PMR* and continuously promotes the joint growth of the DAO.

arteum.title: ARTEUM DAO
arteum.subTitle: The most influential Art Collector community

cont.title: With Tokens as the medium, the ARTEUM DAO realizes limitless potential by recruiting a group art collecting guild for the collection of various art pieces, gallery management, and other cultural ventures.
cont.desc: The DAO supports various activities based on collected works of art, contributing to revitalization of the art world through the discovery of rising artists, and collecting art pieces that may not be within the reach of individuals.

cont.title: The DELTA DAO operates an automated asset management protocol based on WEMIX3.0.
cont.desc: The DELTA DAO's strategic directions and pivotal parameters of the protocol are operated with the Trust. The DAO contributes to the development of the WEMIX3.0-based DeFi ecosystem with new ideas.

oracle.title: ORACLE DAO
oracle.subTitle: Linking Blockchain with the real-world through Zero-Knowledge Proof

cont.title: The ORACLE DAO refines real world data to connect it On-chain.
cont.desc: The DAO's goal is to refine many types of real world (Off-chain) data to provide it to users in real-time. Data provided by the ORACLE is utilized to develop various financial products, contributing to the enrichment of the WEMIX3.0 ecosystem.

social.title: Talk about {{type}} DAO now!
social.desc:
The Discord channel is a space anyone interested in the DAO can join. 
There is no designated channel manager. 
Once the DAO has been opened, the DAO members' community will be moved to the Token-based messenger, PAPYRUS.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.subTitle: Connecting the real world with blockchain
purpose.subInfo: With the goal of resolving the issue of lack of access, which is a deep-rooted limit of blockchain technology, the DAO will create a foundation for connecting the real world (Off-chain) with the blockchain where the data can be utilized in various ways.

1.title: Connect the Off-chain data you want On-chain
1.info: Various types of data created Off-chain can be connected On-chain to be utilized for transactions, loans, and more.

2.title:
Various types of technical data 
also used On-chain
2.info: Requests to refine On-chain pricing data into technical data such as M/A, RSI, VWAP, TWAP can be made. Various types of technical data can also be used On-chain to make investment decisions.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.subTitle:
Right at the center 
of the 40 authorities of WEMIX3.0 mainnet operations
purpose.subInfo: As a member of the 40 WONDERS*, the goal is to promote continuous development and growth of the WEMIX mega-ecosystem through transparent and democratic operations.

1.title: With the rights to participate in the various decisions related to mainnet operations
1.info:
Being an NCP comes with the right to participate in 
the various decision-making processes within the WEMIX mega-ecosystem.

2.title: Contributing to the continuous growth of the DAO Token through DAO operations
2.info:
Contributing to the growth of the DAO Token 
through transparent and democratic operations

purpose.comment: *The 40 NCP (Node Council Partner) that make up a pillar of the WEMIX3.0 mainnet

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.subTitle:
On-chain Financial Portfolio
 Built Easy and Stable
purpose.subInfo: By providing an asset management protocol service that enables easy asset deposits and stable realization of profits, the DAO aims to resolve the stereotype of 'DeFi' service being complex and difficult.

1.title: Simple On-chain Investment
1.info: The DELTA protocol automatically invests deposited assets in carefully selected DeFi protocols according to its strategic algorithms by allocating the assets into diverse blockchains.

2.title: Stable On-chain Investment
2.info: The goal of the initial strategies of the DELTA protocol is to minimize the influence of market volatility and to realize stable and continuous profits by utilizing DELTA neutral, which enables the stable generation of profits.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.subTitle: A new paradigm in the culture of art collecting
purpose.subInfo: The DAO builds a new cultural community in the art market through various activities such as collection of art pieces, gallery management, and discovery of rising artists.

1.title: Defining a new art collecting system
1.info: With recommendations of art pieces through expert counsel and an AI that provides estimates of appropriate pricing, the DAO provides opportunities to participate in the main decisions to be made in the purchase, sale, and storage of art pieces, and more.

2.title: Building a new cultural art community
2.info: The DAO contributes to the revitalization of the art market by generating values for real collectors through various cultural and artistic activities.

daoMarquee: Experience a new Art-Ecosystem and realize the way of collecting art that you've always dreamed of.
